award_list.title: 25% Quest Points Complete
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the 25% Quest Points Completed Award! $20,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Earn this award by completing one-quarter of the available Quest Points in the game.

award_list.title: 50% Quest Points Complete
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the 50% Quest Points Completed Award! $50,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Earn this award by completing one-half of the available Quest Points in the game.

award_list.title: 75% Quest Points Complete
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the 75% Quest Points Completed Award! $80,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Earn this award by completing three quarters of the available Quest Points in the game.

award_list.title: 100% Quest Points Complete
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the 100% Quest Points Completed Award! $150,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Earn this award by completing ALL of the available Quest Points in the game.

award_list.title: Good Jumper
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Good Jumper Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Win a jumping arena competition (Advanced or Pro) with at least 2 other opponents to earn this award.

award_list.title: Great Jumper
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Great Jumper Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Win a jumping arena competition (Advanced or Pro) with at least 4 other opponents to earn this award.

award_list.title: Good Racer
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Good Racer Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Win a racing arena competition with at least 2 other opponents to earn this award.

award_list.title: Great Racer
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Great Racer Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Win a racing arena competition with at least 4 other opponents to earn this award.

award_list.title: Good Dressage
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Good Dressage Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Win a dressage arena competition with at least 2 other opponents to earn this award.

award_list.title: Great Dressage
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Great Dressage Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Win a dressage arena competition with at least 4 other opponents to earn this award.

award_list.title: Riddler's Riddles Award
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Riddler's Riddles Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Complete all of the Riddler's Riddles to earn this award.

award_list.title: Minigame Player
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Minigame Players Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Get scores recorded in at least 30 different minigames to earn this Award.

award_list.title: Minigame Master
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Minigame Master Award! $10,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Get scores recorded in at least 60 different minigames to earn this Award.

award_list.title: Minigame Nut
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Minigame Nut Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Play minigames a grand total of 1000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Minigame Crazy
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Minigame Crazy Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Play minigames a grand total of 10,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Beta Tester Award
award_list.on_complete_text: Player was a Beta Tester.
award_list.description: Player was a Beta Tester prior to game going Live.

award_list.title: Geo Wiz
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Geo Wiz Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Earn 7000 or more points in the Geo Hunt mini game.

award_list.title: Pirate Tracker
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Pirate Tracker Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Find 10 buried pirate treasures to earn this award.

award_list.title: Pirate Stalker
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Pirate Stalker Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Find 100 buried pirate treasures to earn this award.

award_list.title: Leprechaun
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Leprechaun Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Find 3 Pots of Gold to earn this award.

award_list.title: Lucky Leprechaun
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Lucky Leprechaun Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Find 20 Pots of Gold to earn this award.

award_list.title: Craftiness
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Craftiness Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Craft 100 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Workmanship
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Workmanship Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Craft 1,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Wrangler
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Wrangler Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Capture horses 100 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Pro Wrangler
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Pro Wrangler Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Capture horses 1,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Pro Trainer
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Pro Trainer Award! $25,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Train horses 1,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Traveler
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Traveler Award! $10,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Take a transport 500 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Globetrotter
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Globetrotter Award! $30,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Take a transport 5,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Trader
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Trader Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Make 100 trades with other players to earn this award.

award_list.title: Well Wisher
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Well Wisher Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Use 100 wishing coins to earn this award.

award_list.title: Star Wisher
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Star Wisher Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Use 1,000 wishing coins to earn this award.

award_list.title: Perseverance
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Perseverance Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Lose 100 arena competitions to earn this award.

award_list.title: Quick Wit
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Quick Wit Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Answer 25 Real Time Riddles to earn this award.

award_list.title: Riddle Genius
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Riddle Genius Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Answer 250 Real Time Riddles to earn this award.

award_list.title: Horse Anatomy Wiz
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Horse Anatomy Wiz Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Earn 10,500 or more points in the Horse Parts mini game.

award_list.title: Diamond Miner
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Diamond Miner Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Earn 19,000 or more points in the Diamond Math Mine mini game.

award_list.title: Coco-Nut Award
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Coco-Nut Award Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Earn 2500 or more points in the Coconut Bounce mini game.

award_list.title: Strong Horse Award
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Strong Horse Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Win a draft arena competition with at least 2 other opponents to earn this award.

award_list.title: Strongest Horse Award
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Strongest Horse Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Win a draft arena competition with at least 4 other opponents to earn this award.

award_list.title: Camel Rider
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Camel Rider Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Ride a camel to earn this award.

award_list.title: Llama Rider
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Llama Rider Award! $3,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Ride a llama to earn this award.

award_list.title: Pegasus Friend
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Pegasus Friend Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Team up with a Pegasus 5 times at the Uniter to earn this award.

award_list.title: Unicorn Friend
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Unicorn Friend Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Team up with a Unicorn 5 times at the Uniter to earn this award.

award_list.title: Vendor
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Vendor Award! $5,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Sell 100 horses to the Pawneer to earn this award.

award_list.title: Pro Vendor
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Pro Vendor Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Sell 1,000 horses to the Pawneer to earn this award.

award_list.title: Top Wrangler
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Top Wrangler Award! $50,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Capture horses 10,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Star Apprentice
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Star Apprentice Award! $50,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Craft 10,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Master Craftsman
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Master Craftsman Award! $250,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Craft 100,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Tour Guide
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Tour Guide Award! $250,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Take a transport 50,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Pro Trader
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Pro Trader Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Make 1,000 trades with other players to earn this award.

award_list.title: Extraordinary Wisher
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Extraordinary Wisher Award! $50,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Use 10,000 wishing coins to earn this award.

award_list.title: Top Vendor
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Top Vendor Award! $50,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Sell 10,000 horses to the Pawneer to earn this award.

award_list.title: Top Trainer
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the Top Trainer Award! $100,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Train horses 10,000 times to earn this award.

award_list.title: Quiz Genius
award_list.on_complete_text: You earned the Quiz Genius Award! $15,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Finish 15 Real Time Quizzes first to earn this award.

award_list.title: UniPeg Friend
award_list.on_complete_text: You have earned the UniPeg Friend Award! $50,000 Bonus!
award_list.description: Team up with a UniPeg 5 times at the Uniter to earn this award.
